instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-000165 turn on, not video
threads.message:
This machine works well with all active sources, but it does not give video, nor backlight; fan turn on

some measures

BKL_EN=0v
EDP_BKLT_EN=0v
PPBUS_G3H=8.6v
PPVIN_S0SW_LCDBKLTFET=8.6v
PLT_RERST_L  =3.2V

threads.title: 820-000165 turn on, not video
threads.message:
There is no reason to search for backlight, if no image present.
But should confirm if you get USB activity at least; or no reason to search for image too.
Check on both USB ports...
